channel.title: Swimming on Wonderful World
channel.description: Recent content in Swimming on Wonderful World

item.title: Ginnie Springs
item.description: Located on the Santa Fe River in High Springs Florida, Ginnie Springs is one of the clearest springs in Florida. The 72-degree water is perfect for river tubing, swimming, snorkeling, scuba and cave diving.

item.title: Havasu Falls
item.description: Waterfall on the Havasupai Indian Reservation, known for swimming in a dramatic blue-green pool.
